characters.skillPriorityDescription: Below you can find the order of leveling the abilities for {name}.

codes.title: Gift Codes
codes.howToRedeem: How to Redeem Wuthering Waves Codes
codes.howToRedeemGuide: In-game menu, click the settings icon in the bottom right corner. Select the "Other Settings" tab with the spanner symbol. Hit the "Redeem" button next to the "Redemption Code" under Account.
codes.redeemRequirementGuide: You must be at least Union Level 2 and completing the Chapter 1, Act 1 "Utterance of Marvels: I" main quest.

comments.empty: Leave a comment so your voice will be heard first.

commit.successfully: Thank you for your contribution, your request has been sent and is being reviewed.

common.name: Name

common.invalidLink: Invalid link, please check it again

common.title: Title
common.upcomingContent: This page is about upcoming content.

common.rolesRequiredAnyMessage: You need one of the following roles to use this feature.

convene.message: Wuthering Waves will delete convene history after 6 months, back up your convene history now!

import.title: Import Convenes
import.invalidLink: Invalid link, please check it again

1.title: Open Wuthering Waves in this PC then open the convene history in the game and wait it to load.

2.title: Press START on your keyboard, then search for Powershell
2.content: Open {windowsPowerShell} and run the following command (Paste your game path if asked).

3.title: Paste the Convene Record URL into the box below.

1.title: What if I import many different accounts?
1.content: Don't worry, when you import multiple accounts we will automatically split them and you will see an account switch button appear.

2.title: Why not updating the record?
2.content: There is a 30-minute delay for record updates. If no data is shown on this page, please try again later. Convene displayed time zone:America(UTC-5); Europe(UTC+1); Asia,HMT, SEA(UTC+8).

3.title: Is my account safe?
3.content: Yes, through this import method it will not be possible to interfere with your account. And finally, this website is open source on github you can see and evaluate it yourself, if you still don't trust you can skip this feature and use other features.

history.title: Pity Tracker
history.empty: You currently have no Convene History.

rank.title: Your Global Rank
rank.more: You have more pull than {percentage}% users
rank.less: You have less pull than {percentage}% users

desktopApp.title: Desktop App
desktopApp.introduce: With the desktop app, you can import your convene history automatically, view live maps in-game, view item information, and more.

messages.1: Thank you! Hope you find it useful.
messages.2: I made this website for fun when I have some spare time. I will add more features and update the data every update, because I like to explore the game and I'm kind of min-maxing it.
messages.3: If you want to donate, your donation will definitely help on improving the site and motivating me to add more stuff to me! Thank you very much and have fun, hope you like it!
messages.4: If you like coding, you can also contributing to the project on Github.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Provide a short description of the post.

items.title: Items
items.obtainedFromConvenes: {item} is a Resonance Chain Activation Materials obtained from Convenes used to level {character} Resonance Chain.

pinCluster.title: Pin Cluster
pinCluster.description: When enabled, pins of the same category will be clustered to reduce lag.

hideMarkedPins.title: Hide Marked Pins
hideMarkedPins.description: When enabled, marked pins will be hidden on the home page.

multipleAccounts.description: To store marked between different accounts, you just need to import the convene data then you will see an account switch button appear.

pinCluster.description: By default, the Pin Cluster feature will be enabled. You can turn it off in settings.

meta.title: WutheringWaves.app
meta.description: Pity tracker, todo list, database, analysis, global stats and more for Wuthering Waves!

timeline.title: Event Schedule Timeline
timeline.description: Wuthering Waves event timeline calendar, view when an event order will start and end with neat timeline.

echoes.title: Echoes

id.description: {name} is a {rarity} Class Echo in Wuthering Waves.

echoes.description: Explore the world of Echoes for Wuthering Waves. Our site helps you find the best Echo builds for your characters.

id.title: {name} Guide and Build
id.description: {name} is a playable {attribute} Congenital Resonator in Wuthering Waves. Find their best builds, teams, rotations, and other information here.

characters.description: Discover the complete Wuthering Waves character guides. Here you'll find information on materials to summon, the best echoes, optimal team combinations, and much more.

id.description: {name} is a {type} weapon in Wuthering Waves, obtainable through the game's Convene system. Finding ascension materials and tracking your weapon's rank.

weapons.title: Weapons
weapons.description: There are five types of weapons in Wuthering Waves, they are Sword, Broadblade, Gauntlet, Pistols and Rectifier.

codes.title: Gift Codes for {time}
codes.description: All codes that you can redeem in Wuthering Waves for free rewards.

history.title: Pity Tracker
history.description: Convene Counter to track your pity counter and track when you get the character or weapon. You can also automatically import the history and backup it from PC, Android, iOS, PlayStation then save it more than 6 months.

global.title: Global Convene Stats
global.description: Wuthering Waves Convene Global average pity percentage from wutheringwaves.app users.

todoList.description: Wuthering Waves Todo List to plan and track items and mora you need, you can also see resin approximation needed to farm the items!

tierList.description: Find your best Wuthering Waves Tier list here or create your own tier list. Learn about all latest version Wuthering Waves Tier list.

trophies.title: Achievements
trophies.description: Track your Wuthering Waves achievements easily! Complete list of all achievements and their details.

map.title: Interactive Map
map.description: Wuthering Waves is an open-world game. Our new interactive map is now live, allowing you to track your progress and achieve 100% exploration!

items.title: All items
items.description: Discover detailed information on items for characters, weapons, echoes, and more. Find out where to obtain the necessary resources to level up your characters, enhance your weapons, and improve your echoes.

description.default: {name} in Wuthering Waves. Learn where to find {name} and other information in this guide!
description.recipe: {name} in Wuthering Waves. Learn where to the recipe for {name} and other information in this guide!

leaderboards.title: Leaderboards
leaderboards.description: Wuthering Waves damage leaderboards, profile sharing, character cards generator and more.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.message: What we collects and what it is used for

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.autoImportConveneHistorySubtitle: Your pulls will automatically refresh when you visit website.
accounts.empty: To add an account, you just need to import convene history.

roles.title: Your roles
roles.message: You have successfully linked to Discord.
roles.setupGuide1: After joining Discord, you need to send a direct message with the content below to the BOT named "{name}".
roles.setupGuide2: You will receive the verify code from BOT, copy and paste it here.
roles.emptyRoles: You don't have any roles yet!

syncData.title: Sync data
syncData.introduce: We uses the {provider} to save and sync your data on Cloud. We can only read and write files that this site created.

exportData.title: Export data
exportData.introduce: You can download your convene data for backup or move it to another site.

importData.title: Import data
importData.introduce: You can import data from other sites.

eraseData.title: Erase All Data
eraseData.introduce: Your data will clear in your browser and cloud sync. If website doesn't work or has errors, you can use this feature to fix it.

confirm.title: DANGER!!!
confirm.message: Your data will clear in your browser and cloud sync.

conflict.title: Your Data Conflict
conflict.message: Your local data in this browser is conflicting with the one stored in Cloud!
conflict.smallSizeWarning: CAREFUL, THE SIZE IS MUCH SMALLER!

todoList.title: Todo list
todoList.empty: Nothing to do yet! Add some from the Items page or the Calculator.

updater.message: Click refresh to get the new update
